name: Roll Ball Soccer
description:
Roll Ball Soccer is a new slide puzzle game that will put your brain to the test.

You are a football player and you have to score a goal. Slide the blocks of field with your finger and unblock the ball’s path to the goal.

Roll Ball Soccer has everything you love of fun games:

- Puzzle game. The soccer field is formed by blocks.
- Slide game. A simple control based on sliding your finger.
- Unblock game. If you don’t change the blocks of place, you will never find the path to the goal.
- Hidden object game. You have to find and create the right path.
- Maze game. The ball is trapped; find the way to escape and score a goal!
- Physics game. Solve the physic problems to complete the levels.
- Brain teaser game. Exercise your brain and practice your visual and spatial abilities.
- Family game. Fun and problem solving exercises for children and players of all ages.
- Soccer game. The aim is to strike a goal at the football field.

Will you be the next puzzle Ronaldo or Messi?
Download Roll Ball Soccer and start striking goals!

FEATURES

- Slide your finger to move the blocks of field
- Create a path to score a goal
- Tons of addictive levels for hours of fun
- Each level has 3 cups to collect. It’s not necessary to collect any cup to complete a level
- Each level can be more challenging by trying to collect as many football cups as possible on the path to the goal
- No time limits
- No wi-fi required
- Restart button
- Free hints to help in case you can’t find the path

Are you ready for our puzzle match?
Download Roll Ball Soccer now and try this exciting and addicting slide game!
